name: postgresqlrag
description: Using PostgreSQL with the new pgvector extension, enabling vector search.

scripts.drop-db: export PGPASSWORD='password'; psql -U root -h postgresql_rag_db -d postgres -c "DROP DATABASE postgresql_rag WITH (FORCE);" && exit 0
scripts.create-db: export PGPASSWORD='password'; psql -U root -h postgresql_rag_db -d postgres -c "CREATE DATABASE postgresql_rag;"  && exit 0
scripts.apply-schema-and-data-and-changes: export PGPASSWORD='password'; psql -U root -h postgresql_rag_db -d postgresql_rag -f db/001.schema.sql -f db/002.adding-knowledge.sql && exit 0
scripts.rebuild-db: npm run drop-db && npm run create-db && npm run apply-schema-and-data-and-changes
